trans-unit.source: Defines a segment of time.
trans-unit.target: 定义时间的段。

trans-unit.source: A timeline represents a segment of time.
trans-unit.target: 时间线表示时间的段。

trans-unit.source: It provides properties that enable you to specify the length of that segment, when it should start, how many times it will repeat, how fast time progresses in that segment, and more.
trans-unit.target: 它提供了属性，您可以指定开始时间，它将重复的多少次时间内该段，以及更多时间的前进速度该片段的长度。

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from the timeline class provide additional functionality, such as animation and media playback.
trans-unit.target: 从时间线类继承的类提供附加功能，例如动画和媒体的播放。

trans-unit.source: The following are examples of some of the different types of specialized timelines available.
trans-unit.target: 以下是一些可用的专用时间线的不同类型的示例。

trans-unit.source: - **Animations**: An <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline> is a type of timeline that produces output values.
trans-unit.target: -**动画**:<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>是一种生成输出值的时间线。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationTimeline>

trans-unit.source: When you associate an animation with a property, the animation updates the property's value as it plays, thereby "animating" it.
trans-unit.target: 当你将与属性关联动画时，动画将更新属性的值，它播放时，从而"进行动画处理"。

trans-unit.source: For an introduction to animations, see [Animation Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 动画的简介，请参阅[动画概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: For information about the different ways to apply animations, see the [Property Animation Techniques Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关应用动画的不同方法的信息，请参阅[属性动画技术概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: - **MediaTimelines**: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline> is a type of timeline that controls the playback of a media file.
trans-unit.target: - **MediaTimelines**: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline>是一种控制播放的媒体文件的时间线。</xref:System.Windows.Media.MediaTimeline>

trans-unit.source: - **ParallelTimelines**: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline> is a type of timeline that groups other timelines.
trans-unit.target: - **ParallelTimelines**: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline>是一种分组其他时间线的时间线。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline>

trans-unit.source: - **Storyboards**: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> is a special type of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline> that provides object and property targeting information for the timelines it contains.
trans-unit.target: -**情节提要**: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>是一种特殊的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline>提供对象和属性目标的时间线，它包含的信息。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ParallelTimeline> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: For more information about <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard> objects, see the [Storyboards Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>对象，请参阅[情节提要概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using timelines, see the [Animation Overview](../Topic/Animation%20Overview.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用时间线详细信息，请参阅[动画概述](../Topic/Animation%20Overview.md)。

trans-unit.source: For an introduction to the timing features of timelines, see the [Timing Behaviors Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 时间线的时间的计时功能的介绍，请参阅[计时行为概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Data Binding and Animating Timelines Most timeline properties can be data bound or animated; however, because of the way the timing system works, data bound or animated timelines do not behave like other data bound or animated objects.
trans-unit.target: 数据绑定和最动画时间线时间线属性可以是数据绑定，或进行动画处理;但是，由于计时系统的方法，不执行操作的绑定或动画时间线行为类似于其他数据的数据绑定，或进行动画处理的对象。

trans-unit.source: To understand their behavior, it helps to understand what it means to activate a timeline.
trans-unit.target: 若要了解其行为，它有助于了解一下激活时间线的含义。

trans-unit.source: When a timeline is applied, copies are made of the timeline and its child timelines.
trans-unit.target: 时间线应用时，将制作时间线及其子时间线的副本。

trans-unit.source: These copies are frozen (made read-only) and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> objects are created from them.
trans-unit.target: 这些副本已冻结 （使其只读的） 和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>从中创建对象。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>

trans-unit.source: It's these clocks that do the actual work of animating the targeted properties.
trans-unit.target: 它是这些时钟将执行对目标的属性进行动画处理的实际工作。

trans-unit.source: If a timeline was data bound or animated, a snapshot of its current values was made when its clock was created.
trans-unit.target: 如果时间线为数据绑定或进行动画处理，其当前值的快照已创建其时钟时。

trans-unit.source: Even though the original timeline might continue to change, its clock does not.
trans-unit.target: 即使原始时间线可能继续更改，其时钟却没有。

trans-unit.source: For a timeline to reflect data binding or animation changes, its clock must be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: 时间线以反映数据绑定或动画更改，必须重新生成其时钟。

trans-unit.source: Clocks are not regenerated for you automatically.
trans-unit.target: 时钟不会重新生成为你自动。

trans-unit.source: The following are several ways to apply timeline changes: - If the timeline is or belongs to a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>, you can make it reflect changes by reapplying its storyboard using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> or the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是应用时间线更改几种方法:-如果时间线或属于<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>，你可以通过重新应用其情节提要使用反映更改<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Begin%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.BeginStoryboard> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard>

trans-unit.source: This has the side effect of also restarting the animation.
trans-unit.target: 这具有还会重新启动动画的副作用。

trans-unit.source: In code, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Seek%2A> method to advance the storyboard back to its previous position.
trans-unit.target: 在代码中，你可以使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Seek%2A>方法向前移动情节提要重新为其以前的位置。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Seek%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If you applied an animation directly to a property using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A> method, call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A> method again and pass it the animation that's been modified.
trans-unit.target: -如果将动画应用到属性使用直接<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A>方法中，调用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A>再次方法并将其传递已修改的动画。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Animatable.BeginAnimation%2A>

trans-unit.source: - If you are working directly at the clock level, create and apply a new set of clocks and use them to replace the previous set of generated clocks.
trans-unit.target: -如果你正在直接在时钟级别，创建和应用一组新的时钟和用它们来替换以前的生成时钟集。

trans-unit.source: For an example of a data bound animation, see the [Key Spline Animation Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011) .
trans-unit.target: 有关数据的一个示例绑定动画，请参阅[密钥样条动画示例](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160011)。

trans-unit.source: Using a Timeline as a Timer A timeline's clock will only progress when there's an event hander associated with it or (in the case of an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock> object) it is associated with a property.
trans-unit.target: 使用时间线的事件处理程序时，将仅在计时器的时间线的时钟与之关联或 (对于<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>对象) 是与属性相关联。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock>

trans-unit.source: For this reason (and others), it's not recommended that you use a Timeline as a timer.
trans-unit.target: 此原因 （和其他内容），不建议，使用时间线作为一个计时器。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value specifying the percentage of the timeline's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration*> spent accelerating the passage of time from zero to its maximum rate.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定的时间线的百分比<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration*>所用的时间消逝从零加速到其最大速率。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration*>

trans-unit.source: Use the AccelerationRatio property to create animations that start slowly and then speed up as time progresses.
trans-unit.target: AccelerationRatio 属性用于创建动画启动缓慢，然后随着时间的推移加快。

trans-unit.source: The AccelerationRatio property is useful for creating ease-in effects or making movement seem more natural.
trans-unit.target: AccelerationRatio 属性可用于创建渐入效果或者使看上去更自然的移动。

trans-unit.source: Use the AccelerationRatio and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.DecelerationRatio%2A> properties together to create animations that that start slowly, speed up, and then slow down again before finishing.
trans-unit.target: 使用 AccelerationRatio 和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.DecelerationRatio%2A>属性在一起以创建开始缓慢、 动画，提高速度，然后在完成之前再次变慢。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.DecelerationRatio%2A>

trans-unit.source: A value between 0 and 1, inclusive, that specifies the percentage of the timeline's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration*> spent accelerating the passage of time from zero to its maximum rate. If the timeline's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.DecelerationRatio*> property is also set, the sum of AccelerationRatio and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.DecelerationRatio*> must be less than or equal to 1.
trans-unit.target: 一个介于 0 和 1，（含)，之间的值，指定的时间线的百分比<> *1> 所用的时间消逝从零加速到其最大速率。如果时间线的<> *1> 也设置属性，AccelerationRatio 总数和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.DecelerationRatio*>必须小于或等于 1。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.DecelerationRatio*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0

trans-unit.source: AccelerationRatio is less than 0 or greater than 1.
trans-unit.target: AccelerationRatio 是小于 0 或大于 1。

trans-unit.source: The sum of AccelerationRatio and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.DecelerationRatio*> exceeds 1.
trans-unit.target: AccelerationRatio 总数和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.DecelerationRatio*>超过 1。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.DecelerationRatio*>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the timeline plays in reverse after it completes a forward iteration.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否在它完成向前迭代后，时间线在播放按相反的顺序。

trans-unit.source: If the AutoReverse property is set to `true`, the timeline plays for twice the length of time specified by its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果 AutoReverse 属性设置为`true`，时间线播放指定的时间长度的两倍的其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A>

trans-unit.source: AutoReverse and Repetitions When a timeline's AutoReverse property is set to `true` and its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior%2A> property causes it to repeat, each forward iteration is followed by a backward iteration.
trans-unit.target: AutoReverse 和时间线的 AutoReverse 属性设置为时重复`true`及其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior%2A>属性使其重复播放，每个向前迭代后跟一个向后迭代。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior%2A>

trans-unit.source: This makes one repetition.
trans-unit.target: 这样一次重复。

trans-unit.source: For example, a timeline with an AutoReverse value of `true` with an iteration <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior.Count%2A> of 2 would play forward once, then backwards, then forwards again, and then backwards again.
trans-unit.target: 例如，时间线以及 AutoReverse 值`true`与迭代<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior.Count%2A>的 2 将向前播放一次，然后向后，再次，然后转发，然后再次向后。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: This value may be positive, negative, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>; a <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> value means the timeline never plays.
trans-unit.target: 此值可能为正数、 负数或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>值的表示时间线永远不会起到。

trans-unit.source: The default value is zero.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为零。

trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when this timeline has completely finished playing: it will no longer enter its active period.
trans-unit.target: 当此时间线完全播放完毕时发生︰ 它不再将进入活动期。

trans-unit.source: If this timeline is the root timeline of a timeline tree, it has completed playing after it reaches the end of its active period (which includes repeats) and all its children have reached the end of their active periods.
trans-unit.target: 如果此时间线的时间线树根时间线，它已完成播放后到达其有效期 （其中包括重复） 结尾，并且所有子项具有都达到其活动周期的结尾。

trans-unit.source: If this timeline is a child timeline, it is considered to have completely finished playing when the root timeline of the timeline tree to which it belongs reaches the end of its active period and all its child timelines have finished playing.
trans-unit.target: 如果此时间线为子时间线，它被视为完全完成播放时其所属达到的时间线树的根时间线活动期和所有子时间线的末尾具有播放完毕的信息。

trans-unit.source: Stopping a timeline does not trigger its completed event, but skipping it to its fill period does.
trans-unit.target: 停止时间线不会触发其已完成的事件，但正在到其填充期间跳过它。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> parameter of the <xref:System.EventHandler> event handler is the timeline's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>参数的<xref:System.EventHandler>事件处理程序是时间线的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> </xref:System.EventHandler> </xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Although this event handler appears to be associated with a timeline, it actually registers with the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> created for this timeline.
trans-unit.target: 虽然此事件处理程序看起来与时间线关联，但它实际上注册<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>为此时间线创建。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the rate at which time progresses for the timeline's clock changes.
trans-unit.target: 在这段时间的速率前进时间线的时钟更改时发生。

trans-unit.source: The current global speed of a timeline's clock changes in the following circumstances: - The clock changes direction because of its timeline's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A> setting.
trans-unit.target: 在以下情况下更改时间线的时钟的当前全局速度:-时钟由于其时间线的更改方向<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A>设置。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The clock accelerates or decelerates because of its timeline's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AccelerationRatio%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.DecelerationRatio%2A> property settings.
trans-unit.target: -时钟而加速或由于其时间线的减速<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AccelerationRatio%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.DecelerationRatio%2A>属性设置。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.DecelerationRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AccelerationRatio%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The clock is paused or resumed.
trans-unit.target: -时钟连接而暂停或恢复。

trans-unit.source: - The clock becomes inactive or reactivates.
trans-unit.target: -时钟变为非活动状态，或重新激活。

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed%2A> of one of the clock's parent changes.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed%2A>的时钟的父更改之一。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.CurrentGlobalSpeed%2A>

trans-unit.source: The CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated event is useful for tracking when a timeline's clock becomes paused; in your event handler, use your storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.GetCurrentGlobalSpeed%2A> method or check the clock's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.IsPaused%2A> property to determine whether its clock is paused; compare this against a previously cached value to determine whether it changed.
trans-unit.target: CurrentGlobalSpeedInvalidated 事件可用于跟踪在时间线的时钟变为暂停; 时在事件处理程序，使用你的情节提要<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.GetCurrentGlobalSpeed%2A>方法或检查时钟<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.IsPaused%2A>属性来确定是否已暂停其时钟，则将此与以前缓存的值，以确定它是否更改比较。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock.IsPaused%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.GetCurrentGlobalSpeed%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value specifying the percentage of the timeline's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration*> spent decelerating the passage of time from its maximum rate to zero.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定的时间线的百分比<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration*>减速的时间消逝从其最大速率到零所。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration*>

trans-unit.source: Use the DecelerationRatio property to create animations that slow down before stopping.
trans-unit.target: DecelerationRatio 属性用于创建该在停止前减速的动画。

trans-unit.source: The DecelerationRatio property is useful for creating ease-in effects or making movement seem more natural.
trans-unit.target: DecelerationRatio 属性可用于创建渐入效果或者使看上去更自然的移动。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AccelerationRatio%2A> and DecelerationRatio properties together to create animations that that start slowly, speed up, and then slow down again before finishing.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AccelerationRatio%2A>和 DecelerationRatio 属性在一起以创建开始缓慢、 动画，提高速度，然后在完成之前再次变慢。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AccelerationRatio%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A value between 0 and 1, inclusive, that specifies the percentage of the timeline's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration*> spent decelerating the passage of time from its maximum rate to zero. If the timeline's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AccelerationRatio*> property is also set, the sum of DecelerationRatio and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AccelerationRatio*> must be less than or equal to 1.
trans-unit.target: 一个介于 0 和 1，（含)，之间的值，指定的时间线的百分比<> *1> 减速到所占用的时间消逝从其最大速率零。如果时间线的<> *1> 也设置属性，DecelerationRatio 总数和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AccelerationRatio*>必须小于或等于 1。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AccelerationRatio*>

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 0

trans-unit.source: DecelerationRatio is less than 0 or greater than 1.
trans-unit.target: DecelerationRatio 是小于 0 或大于 1。

trans-unit.source: The sum of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AccelerationRatio*> and DecelerationRatio exceeds 1.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies how the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref> behaves after it reaches the end of its active period.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，指定如何<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref>它到达其有效期末尾后的行为。

trans-unit.source: Set an animations FillBehavior property to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior> when you want the animation to hold its value after it reaches the end of its active period.
trans-unit.target: 将动画 FillBehavior 属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior>如果想要保留其值，它到达其有效期末尾后的动画。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior>

trans-unit.source: An animation that has reached the end of its active period that has a FillBehavior setting of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior> is said to be in its fill period.
trans-unit.target: 已达到其有效期末尾的动画具有 FillBehavior 设置为<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior>被认为是在其填充期间。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior>

trans-unit.source: When you don't want an animation to hold its value after it reaches the end of its active period, set its FillBehavior property to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior>.
trans-unit.target: 如果你不想保留其值，它到达其有效期末尾后的动画，其 FillBehavior 将属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior>

trans-unit.source: Because an animation in its fill period continues to override its target property's value, attempting to set the target property's value through other means might appear to have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 因为动画在其填充期间继续重写其目标属性的值，尝试设置通过其他方式的目标属性的值可能会不产生任何影响。

trans-unit.source: For an example showing how to set a property value after it has been animated, see [How to: Set a Property After Animating It with a Storyboard](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关演示如何设置属性值进行动画处理后的示例，请参阅[如何︰ 设置属性后进行动画处理其与情节提要](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A child timeline stops playing and filling when its parent timeline stops; if you want a child timeline to fill, make sure its parent timeline has a FillBehavior of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior>.
trans-unit.target: 播放和填充其父时间线停止; 时，子时间线将停止如果你想子时间线，以填充，，请确保其父时间线具有<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.FillBehavior> FillBehavior

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> is <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>, the natural duration is determined by that particular class's implementation of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.GetNaturalDurationCore%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A>是<xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>，自然持续时间将由<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.GetNaturalDurationCore%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.GetNaturalDurationCore%2A>该特定类的实现</xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A>

trans-unit.source: If GetNaturalDuration returns <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>, it means that the natural duration is unknown, which implies a natural duration of <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果 GetNaturalDuration 返回<xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>时，即自然持续时间为的未知，这意味着<xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A>自然持续时间</xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>

trans-unit.source: Such is the case for streaming media.
trans-unit.target: 此类是用于流式处理媒体这种情况。

trans-unit.source: Note that passing this method a clock other than the one that was created for this timeline is possible, but will provide unreliable results.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，传递此时间线创建以外的时钟的此方法是可行的但将提供不可靠的结果。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the clock created for this timeline or one of its parent timelines is removed.
trans-unit.target: 为此时间线创建时钟或删除了某个及其父时间线时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event is raised by applying a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RemoveStoryboard> action to a storyboard, using a Storyboard's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Remove%2A> method, or (when working directly with clocks) calling the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: 通过应用引发此事件<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RemoveStoryboard>操作到使用情节提要的情节提要<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Remove%2A>方法，或 （当直接处理时钟） 调用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.ClockController.Remove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Storyboard.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RemoveStoryboard>

trans-unit.source: Although this event handler appears to be associated with a timeline, it actually registers with the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock> created for this timeline.
trans-unit.target: 虽然此事件处理程序看起来与时间线关联，但它实际上注册<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>为此时间线创建。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Clock>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the [Timing Events Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[计时事件概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the repeating behavior of this timeline.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置此时间线的重复行为。

trans-unit.source: If an iteration <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior.Count%2A> is specified and the timeline's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A> property is set to `true`, a single repetition consists of one forward iteration and one backward iteration.
trans-unit.target: 如果迭代<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior.Count%2A>指定的时间线<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A>属性设置为`true`，一次重复组成一个向前迭代和向后的一次迭代。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: A timeline with an <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A> property set to true an iteration <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior.Count%2A> of 2 would play forwards, then backwards, then forwards again, and then backwards again.
trans-unit.target: 时间线<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A>属性设置为 true 迭代<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior.Count%2A>的 2 将播放向前，然后向后，再次，然后转发，然后再次向后。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior.Count%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AutoReverse%2A>

trans-unit.source: Instead of specifying the number of times a timeline plays, you can also specify the total length of time you want the timeline to play.
trans-unit.target: 而不是指定的时间线播放的次数，还可以指定时间线要播放的时间的总的长度。

trans-unit.source: For a timeline to repeat, this <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior.Duration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> value should be greater than the timeline's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 若要重复，此<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior.Duration%2A?displayProperty=fullName>值应大于时间线的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A></xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior.Duration%2A?displayProperty=fullName>时间线

trans-unit.source: For example, a timeline with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> of 2 seconds and a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior.Duration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> of 4 seconds will play twice.
trans-unit.target: 例如，时间线与<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A>的 2 秒和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior.Duration%2A?displayProperty=fullName>的 4 秒，将播放一两次。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior.Duration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior.Duration%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is less than the timeline's <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A>, the timeline's active period is cut short.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior.Duration%2A?displayProperty=fullName>小于时间线的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A>，时间线的活动期被中止。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.Duration%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior.Duration%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information about repeating timelines, see [Animation Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关重复时间线详细信息，请参阅[动画概述](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: An iteration <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior.Count*> that specifies the number of times the timeline should play, a <xref:System.TimeSpan> value that specifies the total the length of this timeline's active period, or the special value <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior.Forever*>, which specifies that the timeline should repeat indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: 迭代<> *1>，它指定的时间线应播放的次数<xref:System.TimeSpan>值，该值指定的总长度此时间线的活动期或特殊值<> *1>，它指定时间线应无限期地重复。</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The default value is a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior"></xref> with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior.Count*> of `1`, which indicates that the timeline plays once.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior"></xref>与<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior.Count*>的`1`，指示时间线播放一次。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.RepeatBehavior.Count*>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.RepeatBehavior*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Sets the desired frame rate of the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 设置指定的所需的帧速率<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.DesiredFrameRate%2A> attached property.
trans-unit.target: 此方法会设置<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.DesiredFrameRate%2A>附加属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.DesiredFrameRate%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.DesiredFrameRate%2A> page.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.DesiredFrameRate%2A>页。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.DesiredFrameRate%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref> to which `desiredFrameRate` is assigned.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"> </xref>到`desiredFrameRate`分配。

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of frames this timeline should generate each second, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the system should control the number of frames.
trans-unit.target: 此时间线应生成每秒的帧的最大数目或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>如果系统应控制的帧的数目。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the rate, relative to its parent, at which time progresses for this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的速率，相对于其父级中，在此的时间的推移<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A timeline's SpeedRatio setting does not have an effect on its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>; that time is relative to the timeline's parent or, if the timeline is a root timeline, the moment at which the timeline's clock was begun.
trans-unit.target: 时间线的 SpeedRatio 设置没有影响其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>; 该时间是相对于时间线的父级或如果时间线为根时间线，从该处开始时间线的时钟时间。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.BeginTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AccelerationRatio%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.DecelerationRatio%2A> are specified, this SpeedRatio is the average ratio over the natural length of the timeline.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AccelerationRatio%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.DecelerationRatio%2A>指定，此 SpeedRatio 通过时间线的自然长度是平均的比率。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.DecelerationRatio%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.AccelerationRatio%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A finite value greater than 0 that describes the rate at which time progresses for this timeline, relative to the speed of the timeline's parent or, if this is a root timeline, the default timeline speed.
trans-unit.target: 有限值大于 0 的描述用于此时间线，相对于其父级的速度时间前进速率或如果这是根时间线，默认时间线速度。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 1.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 1。

trans-unit.source: SpeedRatio is less than 0 or is not a finite value.
trans-unit.target: SpeedRatio 小于 0 或不是有限值。

trans-unit.source: Identifies for the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline.SpeedRatio*>

trans-unit.target: 要添加。
